GAME.TOGGLE_INFO: In each round one player becomes the $t(GAME.COMMON.ROUND_HOST) who has the task to check all the given $t(GAME.COMMON.HINTS) for invalid hints that have not been recognized automatically, e.g. duplicates with typos or $t(GAME.COMMON.HINTS) including parts of the word to guess.
